metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5044 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description:
The WRITE_UNALIGNED function in dwarf_elf_access.c in libdwarf before 20160923 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds write and crash) via a crafted DWARF section.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5044` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20160507-1
libdwarf1 - 20160507-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20160507-1').
